page.title: 13TRADE IN BEAMINSTER
page.content: Trade is confined to the section of Beaminster within our block. One street in central Beaminster has a baker, a draper, butcher, woolshop, carpet shop, 2 antique shops, 1 specialising in clocks, the other in pine and country furniture, newsagency, postoffice with stationery and an estate agent. In the centre are the premises of a tractor sales and servicing company, a building contractor, a plumbing and heating engineering firm and a road surfacing company. There is a licensed hotel, pubs and a garage. On the outskirts of Beaminster a former builder's yard now houses several small businesses and 4 new Co SIRA units have also been built; 2 are occupied by a motor mechanic and an upholsterer. The majority of these businesses do not change hands very often.
